airline: Role: Feature, Description: The name of the airline company is stored in the airline column. It is a categorical feature having 6 different airlines.
source_city: Role: Feature, Description: City from which the flight takes off. It is a categorical feature having 6 unique cities.
departure_time: Role: Feature, Description: This is a derived categorical feature obtained created by grouping time periods into bins. It stores information about the departure time and have 6 unique time labels.
stops: Role: Feature, Description: A categorical feature with 3 distinct values that stores the number of stops between the source and destination cities.
arrival_time: Role: Feature, Description: This is a derived categorical feature created by grouping time intervals into bins. It has six distinct time labels and keeps information about the arrival time.
destination_city: Role: Feature, Description: City where the flight will land. It is a categorical feature having 6 unique cities.
class: Role: Feature, Description: A categorical feature that contains information on seat class; it has two distinct values: Business and Economy.
duration: Role: Feature, Description: A continuous feature that displays the overall amount of time it takes to travel between cities in hours.
days_left: Role: Feature, Description: This is a derived characteristic that is calculated by subtracting the trip date by the booking date.
flight_prefix: Role: Feature, Description: Stores information regarding the plane's flight code prefix. It forms the flight code together with the flight number.
flight_number: Role: Feature, Description: Stores information regarding the plane's flight code number. It forms the flight code together with the flight prefix.
price: Role: Target, Description: Target variable stores information of the ticket price.
